item.title: The Adya Hotel Langkawi provides meeting rooms and a ballroom for MICE events
item.description: Source: Adya Hotel Langkawi website. Interior of a junior suite. The four-star Adya Hotel Langkawi, situated in the Kuah town center on Langkawi Island in Malaysia, is marketed as a perfect starting point for exploring the natural wonders and rich culture of Langkawi, a designated UNESCO Global Geopark. The hotel boasts 207 rooms and suites, each featuring a private bathroom with a bath and shower, along with a balcony that offers scenic views of the sea and town.

item.title: Langkawi hotels are prominently featured in the top 10 Travelers' Choice awards on TripAdvisor
item.description: In 2015, TripAdvisor’s Travelers’ Choice Awards recognized four Langkawi hotels in their top 10 for Malaysia. Additionally, Shangri-La properties secured two spots within the top 10, with a third ranking 11th. Source: TripAdvisor website. The Danna Langkawi Malaysia. Here are the top 10 hotels: The Danna Langkawi Malaysia, Pantai Kok, holds a 5 out of 5 rating from 1,777 reviews. It received an “excellent” rating from 1,508 reviewers, and “very good” from 203 reviewers.
